text: Karen Gordon Mills (born September 14, 1953) is an American politician and businesswoman. She was the 23rd Administrator of the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA). She was sworn in on April 6, 2009. On February 11, 2013, she announced her resignation as Administrator and left the post on September 1, 2013. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Administrators of the Small Business Administration Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Karen Mills
